hubot-weather-ja
================

hubot scripts weather information from weather.livedoor.com

## Installation


* Run the ```npm install``` command

```
npm install hubot-weather-ja
```

* Add the following code in your external-scripts.json file.

```
["hubot-weather-ja"]
```

## Usage

```
bin/hubot

hubot 天気 <地名>
```
